entry.title: Vagrant / VirtualBox - Failed to create the host-only adapter
entry.summary: When using Vagrant on Windows 10 for managing local virtual machine, began to occur an error: Failed to create the host-only adapter. Further on how to fix it. We have: Windows 10 / Vagrant 1.8.5 / VirtualBox 5.1.2 When run the command vagrant up occurs e...
